title: Sheriff: Granville officer, suspect hurt during Oxford drug arrest :: WRAL.com
text:
Find News Near Me 
Oxford, N.C. â€” Officers with the Granville County Drug Unit were involved in a shooting when trying to arrest a suspect wanted on drug charges in a Bojangles' parking lot in Oxford. 
An officer was injured when the suspect tried to run him over, and the suspect was injured from the bullet shattering a window, according to the Granville County sheriff. Credits
